newsitem.title: BELGIUM: EU calls for restraint in West Bank, Gaza.
newsitem.headline: EU calls for restraint in West Bank, Gaza.

text.p: The European Union called on Thursday for restraint between Israelis and Palestinians, saying it was gravely concerned for Middle East peace.
In a statement from the Irish EU presidency, the 15-nation bloc said this week's violence in the West Bank and Gaza Strip was a serious setback to the peace process.
"The European Union views with disquiet the current fragility of the the peace process and the evident crisis of confidence among Palestinian and Arab states," it said.
The statement called on all parties in the region to implement the agreements already reached and to move on to the next stage of peace negotiations.
"It is vital that international confidence be reestablished and commitment to the peace process demonstrated," it said.
